articles.title: Mom-to-be Deepika Padukone Plays With Isha Ambani's Daughter At Ambani Wedding, Photo Goes Viral - News18
articles.description: Deepika Padukone showed off her pregnancy glow at Anant Ambani's wedding. She is expecting her baby in September this year.
articles.content: Mom-to-be Deepika Padukone is preparing to embrace motherhood and fans got a glimpse of her motherly side at the Ambani wedding. Deepika was seen with playing with Isha Ambanis daughter, Aadiya, at A… [+1578 chars]
